title: Three photos down, with Ross Rubin
description: Industry analyst Ross Rubin joins Gartenberg and Ritchie to discuss Google’s new Photos features, Apple’s possible responses, the market for drones, Siri as a speaker *dock*, and more.
itunes:author: Michael Gartenberg, Rene Ritchie, Ross Rubin
itunes:subtitle: Industry analyst Ross Rubin joins Gartenberg and Ritchie to discuss Google’s new Photos features, Apple’s possible responses, the market for drones, Siri as a speaker *dock*, and more.
itunes:summary: Industry analyst Ross Rubin joins Gartenberg and Ritchie to discuss Google’s new Photos features, Apple’s possible responses, the market for drones, Siri as a speaker *dock*, and more.
